description: Visualizations are utilized by RealPlayer to give you a colorful display that responds to the audio signal of media clips you are playing. The visualization images appear in the "Now Playing" screen and in the video thumbnail.

You can access your visualizations by selecting View from the menu then clicking Choose Visualization . This will open the visualization submenu where you can customize the settings of a visualization, get more visualizations, and delete visualizations.
NOTE: The RPV file was last used in version 16 of RealPlayer.
